aircraft.value: Stormbird Attack - AC-8181-258 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Structural fatigue crack at stress point. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 02/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 04/01/2025 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 07/01/2025 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 06/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 10/01/2025 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
